mapper.update:
update threetable
three_num = #{threeNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
threetable_num = #{threetableNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
threetable_version = #{threetableVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
threetable_name = #{threetableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update threetable set three_num = #{threeNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, threetable_num = #{threetableNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, threetable_version = #{threetableVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, threetable_name = #{threetableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, threetable_code = #{threetableCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where threetable_id = #{threetableId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(MAX(threetable_num),0) FROM threetable WHERE three_num = #{threeNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
